channel.title: Thief(Neutral Support)
channel.description:
Night Ability 1: Graverob - Choose a dead player to gain one use of their limited use ability, if they have more than one, you take the one with more uses, if there is a tie you take neither because you spend too much time deciding and the gravekeeper caught you
Night Ability 2: Housebreaking - Choose a living player to take their things, occupying them, you will be able to use the ability they were intending to use on the next night
Passive: Scavenge - You go rooting around the Undertaker's place every night, so you know how many uses each player had of their limited use abilities
Objective: Survive
Lore: IDK
Comments: This will probably be a nightmare to code RIP Also it's Convert Immune
